prerequisites.outro: are reviewed before choosing the setup mode.

setupMode.title: Choose a setup mode.
setupMode.subtitle: Configuration settings will be saved in User Settings.

express.title: EXPRESS
express.description: Fastest option. Automatically download and install the latest SiFli SDK from GitHub. Perfect for quick setup and getting started immediately.

advanced.title: ADVANCED
advanced.description: Configurable option. Choose SiFli SDK source (GitHub/Gitee), version or branch, and installation directory. Can select specific versions or development branches.

existing.title: USE EXISTING SETUP
existing.description: Use an existing SiFli SDK installation. Browse and select your existing SDK directory to configure the extension.

settings.destination: Installation directory will be automatically determined

source.title: SDK Source
source.description: Choose where to download the SDK from

type.title: Download Type
type.description: Select release version or development branch

path.title: Installation Path
path.description: Select where to install the SDK

skipVerification.title: Skip file verification
skipVerification.description: Faster installation but may miss corrupted files

createShortcut.title: Create desktop shortcut
createShortcut.description: Add shortcut to desktop for quick access

addToPath.title: Add to system PATH
addToPath.description: Enable global access to SDK tools

existing.title: Use Existing Setup
existing.subtitle: Browse to your existing SiFli SDK installation

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: This feature will be available in a future update.

success.title: Installation Complete!
success.message: SiFli SDK has been successfully installed and configured.

installPath.label: Enter SiFli SDK container directory:
installPath.selectVersionHint: Please select a version or branch to see the complete installation path

toolchainSource.label: Toolchain download source:
toolchainSource.sifli: SiFli Mirror (Recommended for Chinese mainland users)
